tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UserPreferences (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  theme_color VARCHAR(255),
  temperature_units VARCHAR(10),
  notification_settings BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    timezone VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    theme_color VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE home_settings (
    user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    temperature_unit VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    humidity_threshold INT NOT NULL,
    light_brightness INT NOT NULL,
    motion_sensitivity INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE device_preferences (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(255),
    is_connected BOOL
);

CREATE TABLE control_preferences (
    control_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    control_type VARCHAR(255),
    control_value VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE schedule_preferences (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    schedule_time TIME,
    repeat_days VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR,
  last_name VARCHAR,
  email VARCHAR,
  phone_number VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE HouseSettings (
  house_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR,
  temperature INT,
  lighting BOOLEAN,
  security BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE DevicePreferences (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  device_name VARCHAR,
  device_type VARCHAR,
  status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE ScheduleSettings (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  device_id INT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE NotificationSettings (
  notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  notification_type VARCHAR,
  is_enabled BOOLEAN,
  sound_alert BOOLEAN
)
